Data Visualization

This is a list of references and tools I indexed after completing the fabulous Data Visualization course by Albert Cairo.

Data Cleaning

  • Data Wrangler
  • Allow you to tidy your data into columns, which is easier to display
  • Alternatives: Trifacta or Open Refine

Create Static Charts

  • Flourish
  • Inzight
  • RAWgraph
  • Save as PDF
  • Open in Illustrator, it can change the vector's design
  • Save as html (ai2html)

Create Interactive Charts

  • Functions in D3

Datasets

  • World Bank (extensive)
  • Gapminder (cleaned)

Charts

  • Data Viz Catalogue
  • Summary of Charts
  • Full list of Charts
  • Interactive Data to Viz

Visual Encodings

Encodings

  • Albert Cairo
  • Properties and Best Uses
  • Accuracy

Color

  • Color Brewer 2
  • Chroma.js
  • Color Picker
  • Color Adobe
  • I want Hue
  • Use natural colors in a wide range of hue and brightness (gradient)
  • Use colors with a natural flow
  • Use saturated colors if it is an element of high interest

Font

  • Google Fonts
  • Font Squirrel

Inspiration

  • Redesign charts by Tableau
  • Color Searches
  • Film Palette
  • Photography Palette
